column4: If anyone can help me with my problem, let me know. Trying to do this: cd ~ echo "#! /bin/sh" > skype-cam-fix echo "LD_PRELOAD=/usr/lib/libv4l/v4l1compat.so skype" >> skype-cam-fix chmod a+x skype-cam-fix sudo mv skype-cam-fix /usr/local/bin     somehow.....
It's a set of commands... But okay, let me give you the file itself.
http://stikked.com/view/9439585 - click "Download Paste", save the file, in the GUI mark it executable and run.
